title: Computational Thinking for Digital Culture Development: discussions based on a practical experience
author: Julia Ortiz, Carolina Moreira
abstract: Computational Thinking has been understood as an essential ability in a society mediated by technology. However, literature in the field shows that initiatives for developing this ability rarely address challenging…

title: Introducing computational thinking to pre-service teachers
author: Jiang Li, Paulette Shockey
abstract: Computational, logic thinking and problem-solving skills are extremely important for students' success in the future. This poster describes a collaborative project that was conducted to promote K-8 Computer…
